DOC.brief_summary: RATIONALE : Studying sample bone marrow patient cancer laboratory may help doctor learn change occur DNA identify biomarkers related cancer . PURPOSE : This laboratory study study bone marrow sample patient acute myeloid leukemia .
DOC.brief_title: Biomarkers Bone Marrow Samples From Patients With Acute Myeloid Leukemia
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - To rigorously examine fractionate hematopoietic stem progenitor cell patient acute myeloid leukemia ( AML ) . - To define somatic mutation occur de novo AML , include FLT3-ITD , CEBPA , NPM1 , TET2 , ASXL1 , IDH1 , IDH2 mutation . - To examine cellular compartment ( LT-HSC , ST-HSC , CMP , GMP , MEP ) contain select mutation order mutation occur . OUTLINE : Archived bone marrow specimens analyzed sequence detection mutation Sanger-based resequencing PCR amplicons . Results compare result age-matched healthy control .
